features: Construction: In-Mold, 14 vents. Inside evacuation channels. MSB technology reinforces the perimeter for enhanced protection. A larger head covering offers greater protection at the back of the head for the trail riding demand.
Padding: Airdry®, washable and sealed for enhanced durability
Visor: RAID, specifically designed for the RAID helmet. The V-Plus system makes it easy to install and allows the user to adjust the visor for ideal sun protection
